structure.unit: OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH OF EMPLOYEES

text.section: Occupational safety and health standards may be adopted, modified, or repealed by the board as it shall deem necessary.
Established federal standards and national consensus standards may be adopted by reference.

law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 2, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 251, sec. 7.
